temi SDKThe way to develop skills for temi

that take advantage of your robot's unique abilities!

Documentation
View on GitHub

Follow

Be With Me AKA Follow Mode tells temi to search for a person that is standing next to it, lock on and then follow it's movement.

Navigation & Map & Floor

Location navigation, management and many related functions for your temi rebot.

Speech

temi's speech flow is comprised of four main components - wakeup, ASR (Automatic Speech Recognition), NLP (Natural language processing) and TTS (text to speech).
